entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow ending early this evening then clearing. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
